issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Fix the typo in MiniDFSCluster class

comments.body: Thanks [~linyiqun] for  report this.I have attached HDFS-13210.001.patch.Hope you can review, thanks a lot.
[~zhenyi], there are two places (line2748 or line2769) needed to fix, would you fix another place as well?
Thans [~linyiqun] for reminding.I have attached  HDFS-13210.002.patch.Hope you can review again, thanks a lot.
